item.title: ‘John Candy: I Like Me’ Review: Colin Hanks’ Doc Portrait Pays Poignant Tribute to a Comic Icon’s Life and Legacy
item.description: The TIFF opener features reminiscences by colleagues including Steve Martin, Catherine O’Hara, Dan Aykroyd, Martin Short, Conan O’Brien, Mel Brooks and Tom Hanks.

item.title: Loni Anderson, ‘WKRP in Cincinnati’ Star, Dies at 79
item.description: She received two Emmy noms for being “the smartest person in the room” on the CBS sitcom and tons of tabloid attention for her 1988-94 marriage to Burt Reynolds.

item.title: Loni Anderson, ‘WKRP in Cincinnati’ Star, Dies at 79
item.description: She received two Emmy noms for being “the smartest person in the room” on the CBS sitcom and tons of tabloid attention for her 1988-94 marriage to Burt Reynolds.

item.title: ‘Only Murders in the Building’ Sets Season 5 Premiere Date
item.description: The new season will also introduce new characters played by Bobby Cannavale, Logan Lerman, Téa Leoni, Keegan-Michael Key and more.
